snippet: The inquiry, by the British Serious Fraud Office, is the latest legal fallout from a deal that has saddled H.P. with huge losses and depressed its stock price.
abstract: British authorities open investigation into Hewlett-Packard's claims that it was duped when it bought business software maker Autonomy; inquiry is latest legal fallout from deal that has saddled HP with huge losses and depressed its stock price.
lead_paragraph: The inquiry, by the British Serious Fraud Office, is the latest legal fallout from a deal that has saddled H.P. with huge losses and depressed its stock price.

headline.seo: Britain Investigating Hewlett-Packard Deal for Autonomy
headline.main: Britain Investigating Claims Over a Botched Deal by H.P.
headline.print_headline: Britain Investigating Claims Over a Botched Deal by H.P.
